title: IGN Tries to Get a Technical in NBA 2K13
description: Supposedly, screaming curse words at Kinect can trigger NBA 2K13 refs to charge your coach with a technical foul. The IGN editors are all too happy to test the theory.

transcript_chunks.text: hey everybody it's Greg Ryan is playing NBA 2K1 13 apparently if you yell curse words when the ref is over there the connect picks it up and we'll give you a technical foul so we're going to do that all together here as soon as he as soon he has the intentional foul look he's doing he's making posts happen it's working shot sh it's shot all right here we going to follow fty dirty how did the Phoenix Suns so slow [ __ ] [ __ ] he such a [ __ ] did it work I didn't get a technical foul NBA 2K1 13 better with connect
